oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from prison camp at Elmira, New York
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Miss Mary (Mollie) Pearre from unknown writer, who was a prisoner at Elmira in New York, Ward Number 38. The letter discusses slavery and inquires after the health of the family. The two were cousins. See Mary L. Pearre Diary & Photographs, TSLA Microfilm # 1957.
